txt.en: The Pits of Isengard is a dangerous place filled with all kinds of Orc-kind. Defeat the Abominations...as many as you can!
Defeat Abominations in the Pits of Isengard ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
To earn this deed, you must defeat as many Abominations inside the Pits of Isengard.
